name: ChronicHeartFailureWithReducedEjectionFractionSystolicHeartFailure
title: Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction (Systolic Heart Failure)
description: Diagnosis of chronic heart failure with reduced EF (HFrEF where left ventricular EF [LVEF] is <40%) (Business ID: Entry 3955648)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction (Systolic Heart Failure).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an diagnosis of chronic heart failure with reduced ef (hfref where left ventricular ef [lvef] is <40%).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction (Systolic Heart Failure).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction (Systolic Heart Failure).)
